rules_text:
Vigilance, menace
[i]Siegfried's Calamity[/i] – Whenever Xander, Nohrian Onmyoji attacks, defending player sacrifices a creature they control. If you are attacking that player with another creature, that player discards a card as well.
[i]Darker Dreams[/i] – Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Xander deals 1 damage to target player.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Xander attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, create three 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.
